fields.name: Coding for Finance
fields.description: Learn to build advance data models, automated queries and complex automations across a number of valuable finance use cases.

fields.name: Robotic Process Automation
fields.description: Learn to free your time from the mundane repetitive work tasks using a range of tools to automate the boring stuff freeing you and your team’s time to focus on the creative value-added work.

fields.name: Windows 11
fields.description: Discover all the latest features and functions with the latest version of the world’s most popular operating system.
